summary: A HUGE boost in your FPS, with a bunch of bug fixes that normal FPS optimizations give you as well.
descriptionHtml:
This is alittle different than most FPS Optimizations. This file will give you an fps boost of (depending what your running) 10+ fps with little to no difference in how the game looks. I myself have gone from 23-26- to 35-60. (Before, even inside, I could never cap out to 60:)

 I have also went through the liberty in fixing some bugs that normal FPS optimizations will give you:)
Here are some bugs reportedly fixed.

Esbern will not talk to you or/open the door for you.
Arrows dont shoot far.
Shadows going crazy.
And CTD\'s,


Cool right? Also, here is what my system is running.

Dual Core, 4gigs of RAM, 2.4ghs, and I am running a GEFORCE 320M graphics card. Not the best one but hey. Its what I got.

ENJOY!
author: Charlieness
